OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - HELP WITH HOUSING (ON THE MOVE)

Desc.entry: A chargeable service that is available to anyone aged over 50 years, including those in receipt of direct payments, who would like to purchase one-to-one support to help with a housing related problem. The service can provide practical support to declutter, downsize, move, settle into a new home, sort out utilities, prepare for hospital discharge or find a new home. Support is tailored to the needs of the individual via support planning. The support is purchased in a package consisting of three 2 hour sessions delivered over a 6 week period. Please contact for further information. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 5207254
